div.p: Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxixo die Julij anno et cetera lxxv

quo die Johannes sincler'
conuictus pro perturbacione vxoris Johannis cathkyn adiudicatur in amerciamento curie et emendabit
eedem prout Jura volunt Et in partem emende iniungitur eidem ad dandum dimediam libram
cere ad missam sancti sanguinis et cetera

In the bailye court haldin in the tolbuthe the second day of August the yer'
of god et cetera lxxv Comperit before gilbert of chavmer ane of the bailyes
Dauid mathoson / and askit warde and dome tobe gevin til him anent
the preif that was assignit til William quelp toproduce this day as
for the xl day of a chavmer pertening til William mathoson to the quhilk the
said Dauid is tutour eftir the tenour of the Act made tharupon of before sayand
that he in the name of the said child was cumin til his clepe and his cal of
the said chavmer and of xl s' of mail awing for the same of termis bigane
for nul defens made be the said William quelp And the bailye for waik
nes of court has Resplatit the decisione of the warde and dome forsaidis
quhil friday next tocum apon the quhilkis warde and dome askit be the said
Dauid and that it aucht til haue bene gevin til him the said day he strekit
a borch in the hand of Duncan straloch ane of the seriandis
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio quarto die augusti anno quo supra /

quo die
thomas thomson adiudicatur in duobus amerciamentis in vno videlicet pro perturbacione Johannis
glenmalvyn and in alio pro perturbacione Roberti glenmalvin prout deliberatum
fuit per assisam

The same day alexander rede protestit in plain court that the persecucione made
be Dauid mathoson againnis William quelp clamand him in the name
and on the behalue of William mathoson as tutour til him til devode
a chavmer pertening til the said barn and to pay the mail tharof of certane
termis bigane as in the Act tharapon mare fullely is contenit / sould nocht
turne til the said alexander til na preiudice in tyme tocum as he that allegis tobe
tutour til the said William nor yet to the said barnys rycht ony maner of way

The same day the assise has decretit and deliuerit that William quelp
and Johne of spens litstar ilkane of thaim sal content and pay til James cummyn
as procuratoure til Alexander peirpoynt inglisman ane hamburgh barel of salmond
aucht be thaim and ilkane of thaim be thare awne gravnt made in Juge
ment of before for certane money lent til thame be the said Alexander And for
the payment of the tane hamburgh barel of salmond aucht be William quelp the
said William has assignit to the said James xx s' in part of payment tobe deliue
rit til him of the rediast siluer aucht to the said William of the contentacione promittit
til him be certane personis of this burgh in the name of the hail toune

James be the grace of god king of scottis Til all and sindrie our liegis and subditis
quham it efferis quhais knaulege thir our lettres sal cum greting ffor samekil as it
is lamentabilly menit til ws be our louit Johne of spens litstar the son and air
of vmquhile Adam of spens burges of our burgh of aberdene that throu auentur' of
his craft and vthirwais he is sa tinsalit in gudis that he is nocht of pover to pay
certane dettis and sowmes of money awing be him to certane personis within oure
Realme And in hope that he deligently labour' and travale to Recouir again in gudis
to outred and pay the saidis dettis and sowmes of money / we haue of our speciale
grace and fauoris tharfor Respect and be thir our lettres specialy respectis the saide
Johne his landis and gudis quhatsumeuir tobe vncompellit vndistrenyeit vnar
restit vnvext and vndistrublit be ony Juge spirituale or temporal for the said
dettis or sowmes of money forsaidis for the space of a yer' nixt and immediate
folowing the date of thir our lettres Quharfor we charge straitly and commandis
all and sindri our liegis and subditis forsadis baith spirituale and temporal that nane of
you tak vppon hand to cal arrest distrenye vex inquiet or distruble
the said Johne in his person landis or gudis for the said dettis or sovmes of money
awing be him to quhatsumeuir persons induring the time and space of a yer' aboue
expremit vndir all the hiest pain charge and offens ye may commit and Inrin again
is ws in that part Gevin vndir our priue seil at Edinburgh the xj day of maij And
of our Regnue the xv yer'
James R
Scheues

In the bailye court haldin in the tolbuthe the vij day of August the yer' et cetera lxxv
Johne the vaus ane of the bailyes gert Duncan of straloch ane of the seriandis
lay wande on William quelp . quhilk chargit him on our soueran lordis behalf
lachfully that he sould nocht pass' furth of the tolbuthe vnto the tyme that he
devodit and red a chavmer til Dauid mathoson as tutour til Willy mathison
and pait him of xl s' of mail aucht for the said chavmer of termis bigane eftir
the tenour of the act tharupon the quhilk he chargit him todo rychtsa on the be
half of the aldirman and balyeis

The same day before the aldirman and bailyes in Jugement Dauid galichtly
is becumin dettour oblisand him be his land and gudis til Alexander nachty that
he sal content and pay him thre pundis of vsual money of scotland at the
feist of sanct martyne in wynter next tocum but ony langar delay

Item the said day William quelp at the command of the balyeis was chargit
be Duncan straloch seriand the quhilk layd wand on him that he sould
nocht pass' furth of the tolbuthe quhil he said souertie til James
cummyn of xx s' of siluer in part of payment of a barel of salmond opte
nit be the said James apon him eftir the tenour of the act made tharapon et cetera

Eodem die Willelmus adamson et Johannes filius eius Recepti fuerunt in liberos burgenses
tantum racione paterne libertatis prestito per ipsorum quemlibet solito Juramento pro qua
libertate ipsorum quilibet soluit preposito v s' in alba bursa

Item eodem die cristinus prat gracia prepositi et communis consilij Receptus fuit in liberum
burgensem tantum prestito solito Juramento pro qua libertate soluet Jacobo cummyn citra festum
xiij s' iiij d' beati michaelis proximum xiij s' et iiij d' assignatos eidem per prepositum et consilium ex parte
Willelmi quelp

The same day lindesay harrald strekit a borch apon alexander scrogis for
the wrangwis' halding of a barel of salmond And alsua clamit him
as executour and intromettour til quhilum ser Johne gal in the name of Aly gilru
the of certane ayrschip pertening til hir And til ansuer' to the forsaidis borch
and clamit of ayrschip the said alexander with his forspekar' William blindsel
askit ane lachfull day to the quhilk thare was assignit law day
eftir michelmes next tocum

The xvj day of August the yer' of god M iiijC lxxv the Aldirman and the maist
part of the counsel than gaderit In fauour of Richard of Kyntor and at
the desire and supplicacione of him . has Remittit and frely owyr gefin til
him all dettis and clamis of his comptis quhilkis he was awand to the
toune to the day of this write / and thai haf dischargit and quiteclamit
him of all comptis and Rekningis or dettis to the forsaid day of this write
his ayris executouris and assignais / and nevir tobe clamit tharefor in
tyme tocum / And als he is dischargit and quitclamit of sevyn pundis x s'
aucht be him in Dauy colisonnis countis

Eodem die Johannes Wilson gracia prepositi et communis consilij Receptus fuit in liberum
burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi eo quod disponsauit filiam angusij ihonson vici
v s' in huius ville prestito solito Juramento Et soluit preposito v s' in alba bursa tanquam
filius liberi burgensis et residuum datur caritative in fauorem dicti angusij et cetera

The same day the aldirman and the counsel has grauntit til lindesay har
rald that he sal haue at the next assedacione of watteris tocum ane
half net of the fuyrdis of the wattir of Dee for sik termis and payment
making tharefor as nychtbour and vthiris dois and payis And failyeand of him
that he discess' before the tyme of the next assedacione his wif
sal haue the said tak as forsaid is and for the termis that vthiris nycht
bouris has / heratour the said lindesay sal haue a burges fre tobe
chosin at his awne wil et cetera

Item the said day / the consel has grauntit til ser William scot xl s'
yerlie for his clething quhil thai be forthir avisit

The same day the aldirman and the consel has set til James cummyn at the
instans of Richard of Kintor the Rude maillis of the burgh of aberdene for the
terme of a yer' tocum The entra of the said James in the forsaid tak begin
nand at martymes next eftir the date of this write And topay fyve
pundis at the Witsonday thare next and immediat eftir folowand . borch
for the said James Dauid colison for the payment of the said sowme for
the said Rude mail' / the quhilk Dauy has protestit in presence of the consel
that gif the mail of the ta terme beis vnpait to the tothir terme that
the forsaid assedacione be vakand . and lesum tobe set til vthiris that
wil mak gude payment at the termis et cetera

Item the same day It is ordanit be the aldirman and the consel that William quelp
salbe pait of fyve merkis and a half quhilk restis vnpait of the sowme
of ten pundis that was promittit til him of before be the consel . quhilkis
v merkis and demi salbe rasit and pait of y ony that is awand the martymes
mail next tocum . heratour thare sal be pait on his behalf til James
cummyng half a merk / and gif thare happinnis ony burges to be made
betuix this and michelmes next tocum the forsaid sex merkis salbe pait
of the burges and nocht of the martymes mail
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio xvijo die augusti anno et cetera lxxv /

quo die Dauid
hil et Dauid gethan conuicti pro perturbacione adinuicem per assisam in verbo primo
ipsorum quilibet amerciatur et emendabit alter altri prout Jura volunt

Eodem die Dauid hil inuenit Willelmum blindsel iuniorem plegium legalem pro eo
de indempnitate Dauid gethan aliter quam per viam Juris Et Dauid gethan
dedit Willelmum hay plegium legalem pro eo de indempnitate Dauid hil ut supra

Die xxja augusti anno predicto Dauid gethan et Dauid hil conuicti per assisam
de iniusta perturbacione adinuicem ex precogitata malicia ipsorum quilibet
amerciatur et emendabunt prout Jura volunt Et in partem emende assisa deli
berauit quod ipsorum quilibet die Dominica proximo sequente veniet de ly vesthry
ad chorum beati nicholai et quilibet presentabit candelam ceream ponderis
vnius libre cere preposito / que candele dabuntur lumini beati nicholai Insuper quilibet
ipsorum soluet in prompta pecunia absque dilacione viginti solidos / quj quadra
ginta solidi soluentur Dauid colison pro Reparacione de le key sive clauis huius burgj
Item Dauid hil inuenit Willelmum blindsel seniorem plegium legalem pro eo de indempnitate Dauid
gethan aliter quam Jura volunt Et patricius androson deuenit plegius legalis
pro Dauid gethan de indempnitate Dauid hil ut s' et cetera

Eodem die Willelmus gariach Receptus fuit in liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde prestito
solito Juramento / quj presentatus fuit per Dauid colison et Receptus ad dictam libertatem
ad instanciam suam cum ipso tantum finien' pro eadem libertate racione promissi sibi prius facti pro redempcione
cuiusdam libri communis de manibus Johannis mar' secundum tenorem acti desuper facti et cetera

The same day In presence of the aldirman and diuers' of the consel Androw scherar'
resignit owyr til Alexander rede and til Mage of cullan his spous' and
til the langast liffand of thaim twa the tane half of the towne of Rub
bislaw with the pertinens for alslang termys as he has tak of the said
toune / of the quhilk / the assedacione is vndir the commoune seil with the
assedacione of the wattirris that is tosay for the termis of sevyn yeris
entirand in the said tak at the Witsonda before the date of this write
and quhil sevyn yeris be fullely complete and runnyn thareftir
witnes of the said resignacione made in the chavmer of the tolbuthe
of aberdene the forsaid day Alexander of chavmer aldirman in the tyme Johne
the Vaus ane of the bailyes Dauid mathoson William blindsel
Patrik badenach common clerk and patrik badenache his son with
vthiris sindrie Ego patricus baydenach' Communis scriba de Abirdene
presens fui et audiui predictam resignacionem fore
uel supra scribitur In Cuius testimonium hoc scriptum
manu propria subscripsi

The vij day of aprile the yer' of our lord M iiijC lxxvj Androw scherar' burges of aberdene
has purely and sympli resignit and gevin our' til alexander rede burges of the said
burgh and til mage of culan his spous' and to thare helpis and to the langast
liffand of thaim twa the tothir half of the toune of Rubbislaw eftir as it is
aboue expremit of the first half for al the termis of the said androwis tak of the
assedacione of the said toune of Rubbislau that is tosay for vij yeris as befor'
is expremit The forsaid alexander rede entirand in the said tak at Witsunda
before the day of the making of this present write Witnes of this last resigna
cione Robert of culan and maistir alexander of culan parson' of owyn his brothir
with the subscripcione of my hand patrik badenach common clerk of Aberdene
Ego patricius baydenach' subscribo manu
propria et cognosco prescripta fore vera

Die prima mensis Septembris anno Domini et cetera lxxvto Coram Johanne Vaus Vno ballivorum
in pretorio de aberdene Johannes glenmalvin fatebatur se plegium patricio bissat pro
alexandro forbes pro vna barella salmonum mensure hamburgensis termino solucionis
ad festum beati Johannis baptiste in medio estatis vltimo elapso Vnde dictus bal
liuus iniunxit ad satisfaciendum seu satisfieri faciendum dictam barellam salmonum
predicto patricio infra quindenam proximo futuro

The same the consel gadirit in the chavmer of the tolbuthe of aberdene of
the quhilkis the names eftir folowis that is tosay Alexander menyes Johne of
mar' Johne of Knollis Dauid colison Johne the Vaus Dauid symson Alexander
blindsel alexander howison Johne Wormot alexander rede Dauid mathoson
patrik badenach and gilbert morison / endit and deliuerit and ordanit with
full consent and assent of thaim all na man gainstandand / that Alexander of chavmer
son and apperand ayr til Alexander of chavmer aldirman of aberdene in the tyme
his fadir sal haue the hail towne of the Garrowne with the pertinens til him
and his assignais for the termis of threttene yeris tocum / the entra of
the said alexander in the said tak beginnand at the Witsonda before the date
of this write / and to remayn tharewith fra thyne quhil the forsaid
threttene yeris be complete and Runnyn writin the forsaid first day
of Septembre the yer' of our' lord M iiijC sevinty and five yeris

The xj day of Septembir the yer' et cetera lxxv . Comperit before gilbert
of chavmer ane of the bailleis of aberdene in the tolbuthe of the said burgh
thom mason and producit in witnes Nicol mason and Sym masoune
quhilkis the gret aith sworne deponit that the land that was quhilum
Wil the rossis liand in the gaistraw betuix the landis of Johne of
tulideffis on the ta part and Dauy talyouris on the tothir syde was
assignit and frely deliuerit til the said thom masone be the said
Wil the ross' al wais and quhil that the said thom mason war fullely
content and pait of ten merkis of the vsual payment of scotland quhilkis
the said Wil the ross' promittit til the said thom masone for the mari
age of his dochtir as notourly is previt et cetera
